description: Colorectal cancer, the third most common cancer globally, kills close to one million people every year. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: How South Korea achieved one of the best colon cancer survival rates in the world
title_page: How South Korea achieved one of the best colon cancer survival rates in the world | The Straits Times
maintext:
SEOUL â€“ Mr Park (not his real name) received a health screening package from his children for his 65th birthday.
He was pleased. A friend of his had gone through a similar screening a couple of years earlier and found himself in the pink of health.
